description: Dive into "Sun-Kissed Shores of Puri" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Sun-Kissed Shores of Puri

sources.snippet: Puri Beach is the prime beach attraction in the spiritual town. The beach is known for its golden sands, and activities like horse riding and camel rides.
sources.shortName: Most stunning beaches in and around Puri!

sources.snippet: Located on the tropical coastline of Orissa, Puri Beach is one of the wonderful destinations for holidaying where sun-kissed beaches wet your feet and gentle wind simply elevates you from the earthy fragrance to the clouds. One of the best family beaches of the country, it is a favourite among beach lovers who relish holidaying here as the beach enamours a bewitching opportunity to undergo its wild sea waves and enjoy fun activities like angling, boat ride, swimming, surfing, and sea cruising on its golden sands and the thunder of the breakers appearing from the Bay of Bengal. Puri Beach is also surrounded by ancient holy temples that captivate tourists from all over the world, who visit here to explore the scenic beauty of the beach.
sources.shortName: 6 Most Famous Beaches in Puri

sources.snippet: Swargadwar beach is the most beautiful and crowded beach in Puri, and it's the main tourist attraction of Puri city. Here you will find the food courts , local handmade product shops where you can buy handmade jewellery, seashells products etc. Its nearest beach from Jagannath temple and therefore devotees first take bath here to complete their prayer then visit the temple.Swargadwar beach is always packed with tourists and every tourist prefers to book their hotel near Swargadwar beach because here you will find see view hotels and from here Jagannath temple is 2 km distance.
sources.shortName: 8 Best Beaches in Puri That Makes Your Puri Tour Success - Amazing Tour India

sources.snippet: Puri‚Äôs beaches offer a rich mix of experiences, from the bustling atmosphere of Puri Beach and Swargadwar Beach to the serene, offbeat charm of Balighai and Baliharachandi. Solo traveler, a family on vacation, or a couple seeking some tranquility, Puri has a beach that‚Äôs perfect for you. So pack your sunscreen, grab your sunglasses, and get ready to explore some of the finest beaches that the east coast of India has to offer!
sources.shortName: Best Beach in Puri: Top Spots You Must Visit Now!

sources.snippet: Puri Beach is one of the popular destinations in the city because the place is also a sacred place for the Hindus. This beach is also ideal for surf enthusiasts because it offers choppy waters and splendid sands. The beach has a special area known as Sundarsan Pattnaik Sand Art Area, dedicated to the sand art created by the legendary sand artist Sundarsan Pattnaik.
sources.shortName: Meet The Heavenly Beaches in Puri

sources.snippet: Puri Beach is a beautiful stretch of sand that lies along the eastern coast of India, facing the Bay of Bengal. It is located in the city of Puri, which is one of the four holy dhams (pilgrimage sites) for Hindus. Puri Beach is not only a place of religious significance, but also a hub of entertainment, adventure, and relaxation.
sources.shortName: Puri Beach: A Complete Guide to the Golden Coastline of Odisha

sources.snippet: At a distance of 2 km from Jagannath Temple and 2.5 km from Puri Junction, Puri Beach is a pristine sea beach located along the coast of Bay of Bengal in Puri, Odisha. It is considered as one of the cleanest beaches in India and also one of the best Puri Tourist Places.
sources.shortName: Puri Beach, Puri - Timings, Water Sports, Activities, Best Time to Visit

reviews.text:
A Breath of Sea Air at Puri Beach

Dropped by Puri Beach recently, and I must say, it was just the thing my soul needed. There's something about the sound of waves and that salty breeze that clears your head right out. I got there early and watched the sun rise over the water - absolutely magic. The whole sky lit up like it had been painted fresh that morning.

Walking along the shore barefoot, with the sea gently nudging your feet - it's peaceful in a way that's hard to explain. Come evening, the place gets lively in the best way: locals out for a stroll, stalls sizzling up snacks, kids chasing waves, and the odd camel plodding along looking half-interested in it all. I grabbed some coconut water and a few bites of local street food - nothing fancy, but it hit the spot.

The only downside is the crowd during holidays - it gets absolutely packed, and you do lose a bit of that calm. Plus, there's the occasional litter left behind, which takes away from the beauty of the place.

Still, it's a spot that stays with you. Whether you're after some quiet or a bit of beachside buzz, Puri Beach delivers the goods. Would happily go back, just to hear those waves again.

Puri Beach is a beautiful and lively place, especially during sunrise and sunset. It was quite crowded when I visited, but the view of the sea and waves was amazing. A great spot to relax, walk barefoot on the sand, and enjoy the local vibe.

Puri Sea Beach is a beautiful and peaceful place to visit. The view of the sunrise and sunset is amazing. The sound of the waves and the cool breeze make it very relaxing. The beach is clean in the morning, and many people come here for a walk or to enjoy the sea. You can also find tasty street food, tea, and souvenirs nearby. Camel and horse rides are also available for fun. It's a great place for families, friends, and solo travelers.

places.generalDescription: Golden Beach in Puri is a bustling Hindu sacred place and the venue for the annual Puri Beach Festival and sand displays. It's one of the best beaches in Puri, connected to other nearby beaches like Niladri Beach and Swargadwar Beach. The beach spans about 870 meters and has received Blue Flag certification for its cleanliness and environmental safety.

sources.shortName: Most stunning beaches in and around Puri!

sources.snippet: Golden Beach is one of the best beaches in Puri and all the above beaches are connected to each other, so you can easily reach each beach by walking.Cleanliness is the beauty of Golden Beach and it has received Blue Flag certification for its upkeep and environmental safety. The length of this beach is about 870 meters and it is connected to Niladri Beach on one side and Swargadwar Beach on the other. Here you have to pay 20 rupees for three hours and that time is enough to enjoy the beach life and here you can go to the garden built near the beach and also do good photography.
sources.shortName: 8 Best Beaches in Puri That Makes Your Puri Tour Success - Amazing Tour India

sources.snippet: Located at a distance of 20 kilometres from Puri on a little diversion on the highway leading to Konark, Golden Beach is a tranquil, laid back beach away from the din of the city. The beach is untarnished and desolated and boasts of a perfectly peaceful environment with only the crashing of sea waves to provide you company. As its name suggests, the beach is replete with the rich, glowing tones of the picture perfect sand that spills out onto the waterfront of the Bay of Bengal.
sources.shortName: 6 Most Famous Beaches in Puri

sources.snippet: Puri Beach, also known as Golden Beach, is a hotspot for both tourists and devotees. Beach is often filled with people visiting Puri for a dip in the holy waters and to pay homage to Lord Jagannath at the nearby Jagannath Temple. Puri Beach is renowned for its golden sands and calming atmosphere, but what truly sets it apart are the stunning sand sculptures made by internationally acclaimed artist Sudarshan Patnaik.
sources.shortName: Best Beach in Puri: Top Spots You Must Visit Now!

sources.snippet: The beach ends at the mouth of the Bay of Bengal and many visitors say that as the day turns to night and night to day, you can see the ever-changing colours of water. You can experience the otherworldly beauty at this beach. Since it‚Äôs not a very popular beach, the amenities here are less than other beaches.
sources.shortName: Meet The Heavenly Beaches in Puri

sources.snippet: The Golden Sea Beach in Puri has been given the prestigious Blue Flag Beach tag. It is located about 2 km distance from the Lord Shree Jagannath temple in Puri. India has ten blue-flag beaches, and the golden beach of Puri is one of the best of them.
sources.shortName: 20 Best Sea Beach & Cleanest Beaches in Odisha

The beach is well- maintained and clean. You can hire beach chairs for a fee. There are food stalls and vendors selling local snacks and drinks. You can find camel and horse rides on the beach.
A nice place to enjoy during evening. A lot of shops are there , food stalls you can go for a camel ride and even for a bath at the beach . Amazing view of sunrise and sunsets

sources.snippet: Penthakata Sea Beach is a popular tourist attraction in Puri. The Penthakata Beach is located 5 km distance from Shree Jagannath Temple and 3 km from Blue Flag Golden Beach. The Odisha tourism department has recognized Penthakata Beach as a tourist destination.
sources.shortName: 20 Best Sea Beach & Cleanest Beaches in Odisha

places.name: Puri sea beach

reviews.text:
Visiting the sea beach was an absolutely magical experience, filled with breathtaking views, soothing waves, and an atmosphere of pure relaxation. The moment I stepped onto the golden sand, I felt an immediate sense of peace and joy. The gentle sea breeze carried the refreshing scent of saltwater, and the rhythmic sound of the waves crashing against the shore was truly mesmerizing.

One of the most enjoyable moments was watching the sunrise over the horizon. As the sky transformed into a canvas of warm oranges, pinks, and purples, the reflection on the water created a picture-perfect scene. Walking barefoot along the shoreline, with waves playfully touching my feet, was both refreshing and calming.

Just a memorable moment üòå

Wanna visit again ü•∫‚ù§Ô∏è

places.address: Sea Beach Rd, Puri, Odisha 752001, India

places.generalDescription: Swargadwar Sea Beach, also known as the "door to Heaven," is a sacred and peaceful beach in Puri. It holds significance for Hindu pilgrims who consider it holy and come here to take a dip in the water. The beach features a buzzing night market with stalls selling seafood, clothing, and jewelry. Visitors can relax on chairs available for rent while enjoying the cool sea breeze. Although water sports are not available, camel and horse riding can be enjoyed.

sources.shortName: Puri Beach Tourism (Puri) (2024 - 2025)

places.name: Swargadwar Sea Beach

reviews.text:
Hari Beach, a fantastic destination for Beach, lovers, foodies, and family alike. Vibration, mixture and range of repeat makes it a memorable experience.
Be prepared for crowded, especially during the peak season. A beach offered a wide range of delicious seafood options from traditional and Odisha to popular State Food. ü•ò

Camel race are great way to experience that speech from a unique perspective. üê´

It's a funny activities for both kids and adults with affordable pricing for children's ‚Çπ50 and adults under rupees each.

Swargadwar Beach in Puri offers a perfect blend of relaxation and excitement. Its close proximity to many hotels makes it easily accessible for visitors. The beach is clean and serene during the day, with small shacks offering refreshments. As evening falls, the area comes alive with a vibrant night market, attracting larger crowds. Visitors can also enjoy horse and camel rides along the shore. For those seeking a more peaceful experience, Swargadwar Beach provides a beautiful setting to unwind, with the soothing sound of the waves and refreshing sea breeze.

Busy beach next to the Swargadwara crematorium. It is a unique experience walking along the beach. While the experience is unique, it might not be pleasant. The crowd and noise may be unsettling. The camels and horses are visibly being mistreated. There are a lot of shops but barely anything worth buying. There's fresh sea catch being fried and sold but the hygiene involved in such preparations is anyone's guess. There's hotels and hotels on the other side of the road. The sea beach is more or less clean although it can be beautified a lot more to make it more attractive. The waves are also strong. Overall it's just okay. The humidity makes it worse.

places.address: Sea Beach Rd, Puri, Odisha 752001, India

places.generalDescription: Model Beach is a stunning 700-meter stretch of pristine shoreline that embodies the essence of beach tourism with its clean sands and inviting atmosphere. This idyllic spot, part of a sustainable initiative by Barefoot, offers visitors the chance to unwind under palm umbrellas or bask in the sun for that perfect tan. Unlike more crowded beaches like Golden Beach, Model Beach provides a serene escape where you can enjoy the tranquility of nature without overwhelming crowds.

sources.snippet: Running along the main Marine Drive of Puri, right next to the Swargadwar Crematorium, this popular beach in Puri is the throbbing heartbeat of the city and is brimmed with visitors throughout the year. The beach is dotted with numerous stalls selling local handmade products, seashells, and fashion knick-knacks. The beach also has great religious importance as Swargadwar literally means ‚ÄòDoor to Heaven‚Äô.
sources.shortName: 6 Most Famous Beaches in Puri

sources.snippet: There are many places to visit in Puri but Swargadar Beach is one place that you cannot afford to miss. Its name literally translates to ‚Äúdoors to heaven‚Äù and the place holds a religious significance. Some legends state that this secluded beach was the bathing place of Sri Chaitanya Dev, the prophet of the Vaishnav people, and his devotees.
sources.shortName: Meet The Heavenly Beaches in Puri

places.name: Puri Swargadwar Beach

reviews.text: Puri Swargduar Sea Beach offers an exceptionally amazing experience. While it can get a little crowded, especially in the evenings, it more than makes up for it with the vibrant atmosphere. The market shops nearby are beautiful and perfect for evening strolls, offering a variety of goods and local crafts. The seafood here is a must-try, with fresh, delicious options available. As one of the prime locations in Puri, it's easily accessible, making it a popular choice for visitors. The overall vibe is relaxing and enjoyable, with scenic views and a lively environment.

One of most famous sea beaches in the coromandel part is Puri Swargadwar Beach. Most of the tourists gather in this beautiful beach because of maximum hotel & guest houses are nearby this beach. Most tourists take bath & enjoy sea current here. After evening many food stalls open here & tourists enjoy the evening snacks here.

The ultimate package of mental peace and a trip with your loving ones. The sunrise and sunset here is a jaw dropping and breeze and waves is like borax to the gold.

Don't miss the evening SAMUDRA AARTI, it feels as you are remembering your ancestors and feel their presence.

reviews.text: Niladri Beach is a fantastic option for those seeking a cleaner, quieter, and more relaxed beach experience in Puri. The well-maintained facilities and scenic beauty make it a pleasant destination for families, couples, and solo travelers. It provides a welcome contrast to the crowds of the main beach while still being easily accessible. If you appreciate a peaceful environment and a cleaner shoreline, Niladri Beach is definitely worth a visit.

One of the best and cleanest beaches in Puri. It's almost semi-private with a small number of people visiting. The water is clean and the beach sand is fine. The waves are strong and a small number of life guards are also available. The beach has been beautified by a number of sculptures. There is no rabble here, no noise pollution or blasting music on speakers and the crowd is also mostly decent. Beach chairs are available to sit and watch the waves. A beautiful beach to just listen to the waves crashing and take a bath if you feel like it. Highly recommend. A number of very good hotels are available right on the beach. The beach also boasts of a pretty well maintained flower garden after the entrance to the beach. Parking of two and four wheelers is available on the payment of a nominal amount.

Niladri beach üèùÔ∏è üèñÔ∏è

Niladri beach is perfect spot and best beach in puri which I observe specifically the well maintained Garden for families and children to play and walk .
This beach is very peaceful and calm best time to visit in 4pm to 8 pm. Lots of activities also can play at beach .
This beach has lots of hand crafted arts are there which mad-up of wasted items.

If you are in puri you must try to visit this beach. üèùÔ∏è üèñÔ∏è
